title: [Ta'Illistim, Glamesine Var]
description: The Ta'Illistim Theatre dominates the var.  The stone cladding on the structure has been sectioned off into panels, each of which is carved with a different scene of players on a stage.  Carved white marble planters brimming with fragrant flowers line the flagstone walk leading to the wide front doors.

The Ta'Illistim Theatre dominates the var.  The marble cladding on the structure has been sectioned off into panels, each of which is carved with a different scene of players on a stage.  Planters brimming with white roses line the flagstone walk leading to the wide front doors.
